name: RTCSctpTransport.state
description: The state read-only property of the RTCSctpTransport interface provides information which describes a Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) transport state.

The state read-only property of the RTCSctpTransport interface provides information which describes a Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) transport state.
